00038 bool TableInfo::remove(const String &end_row) {
00039   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00040   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00041 
00042   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00043     return false;
00044 
00045   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00046 
00047   return true;
00048 }

00050 
00051 bool
00052 TableInfo::change_end_row(const String &old_end_row,
00053                           const String &new_end_row) {
00054   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00055   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(old_end_row);
00056 
00057   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00058     return false;
00059 
00060   RangePtr range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00061 
00062   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00063 
00064   iter = m_range_map.find(new_end_row);
00065 
00066   HT_ASSERT(iter == m_range_map.end());
00067 
00068   m_range_map[new_end_row] = range_ptr;
00069 
00070   return true;
00071 }

00074 void TableInfo::dump_range_table() {
00075   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00076   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00077        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter) {
00078     cout << m_identifier.name << "[" << (*iter).second->start_row() << ".."
00079          << (*iter).second->end_row() << "]" << endl;
00080   }
00081 }

00084 bool TableInfo::get_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00085   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00086   string end_row = range->end_row;
00087 
00088   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00089 
00090   if (iter == m_range_map.end()) {
00091     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo couldn't find end row ("<< end_row <<")"<< HT_END;
00092 
00093     for (iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00094       HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo map: "<< (*iter).first << HT_END;
00095 
00096     return false;
00097   }
00098 
00099   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00100 
00101   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00102 
00103   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row)) {
00104     HT_INFO_OUT <<"TableInfo start row mismatch '" << start_row << "' != '"
00105                 << range->start_row << "'" << HT_END;
00106     range_ptr = 0;
00107     return false;
00108   }
00109 
00110   return true;
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 bool TableInfo::remove_range(const RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00115   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00116   string end_row = range->end_row;
00117 
00118   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00119 
00120   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00121     return false;
00122 
00123   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00124 
00125   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00126 
00127   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row))
00128     return false;
00129 
00130   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00131 
00132   return true;
00133 }

00135 
00136 void TableInfo::add_range(RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00137   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00138   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(range_ptr->end_row());
00139   assert(iter == m_range_map.end());
00140   m_range_map[range_ptr->end_row()] = range_ptr;
00141 }

00143 
00144 bool
00145 TableInfo::find_containing_range(const String &row, RangePtr &range_ptr,
00146                                  String &start_row, String &end_row) {
00147   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00148 
00149   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.lower_bound(row);
00150 
00151   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00152     return false;
00153 
00154   start_row = (*iter).second->start_row();
00155   end_row = (*iter).second->end_row();
00156 
00157   if (row <= start_row)
00158     return false;
00159 
00160   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00161 
00162   return true;
00163 }

00165 
00166 void TableInfo::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00167   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00168   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00169        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00170     range_vec.push_back((*iter).second);
00171 }

00173 
00174 void TableInfo::clear() {
00175   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00176   m_range_map.clear();
00177 }

00183 TableInfo *TableInfo::create_shallow_copy() {
00184   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00185   return new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, &m_identifier, m_schema);
00186 }
